comment: last step of three-step reaction (see R05728, R11442+R04306+R02708) following after R04306
definition: 4-Hydroxyphenylacetonitrile + Oxygen + [Reduced NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] <=> (S)-4-Hydroxymandelonitrile + [Oxidized NADPH---hemoprotein reductase] + H2O
name: 4-hydroxyphenylacetonitrile,[reduced NADPH-hemoprotein reductase]:oxygen oxidoreductase
